original_title: 年上の使えないおじさんバイトに犯された女子大生
overview: Sugiura, an unusable middle-aged part-timer who started working at the restaurant where Aoi works part-time. One day, when he sees Sugiura skipping cleaning after closing, he warns him, and his attitude changes completely. "Don't order me even though you're a female college student!"
title: Hiyori Yoshioka, A Female College Student Who Was Raped By An Older Uncle’s in a Part-time Job
